verses.verse: Now <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H203>On,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6431>Peleth,<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> men:

And they rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> with <S%H376>certain<s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>assembly,<s%> <S%H7148>famous<s%> in the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of renown: <S%H8034><s%>

And they gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Ye take too <S%H7227>much<s%> upon you, <S%H3588>seeing<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> are <S%H6918>holy,<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> of them, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> them: <S%H4069>wherefore<s%> then lift ye up <S%H5375>yourselves<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>
And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, he <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his face: <S%H6440><s%>

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7141>Korah<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5712>company,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Even <S%H1242>tomorrow<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H3045>show<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are his, and who is <S%H6918>holy;<s%> and will cause him to come <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him: even him <S%H834>whom<s%> he hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> will he cause to come <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him.
This <S%H2063><s%> <S%H6213>do;<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> you <S%H4289>censers,<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5712>company;<s%>

And <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> therein, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> doth <S%H977>choose,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall be <S%H6918>holy:<s%> ye take too <S%H7227>much<s%> upon you, ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%>

Seemeth it but a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> <S%H4480>unto<s%> you, <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H914>separated<s%> you from the <S%H4480>congregation<s%> <S%H5712><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to bring you <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> himself to <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto them?

And he hath brought thee <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H853><s%> to him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee: and <S%H1245>seek<s%> ye the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> <S%H1571>also?<s%>

For which <S%H3651>cause<s%> both <S%H859>thou<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5712>company<s%> are gathered <S%H3259>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> ye <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him?

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab:<s%> which <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H3808>not<s%> come up: <S%H5927><s%>

Is it a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hast brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of a <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H3588>except<s%> thou make thyself altogether a <S%H8323>prince<s%> <S%H8323><s%> <S%H1571><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us?

Moreover <S%H637><s%> thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> us <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> or <S%H5414>given<s%> us <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards:<s%> wilt thou put <S%H5365>out<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H376>men?<s%> we will <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H5927>up.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was very <S%H2734>wroth,<s%> <S%H3966><s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6437>Respect<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou their <S%H4503>offering:<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5375>taken<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> have I <S%H7489>hurt<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H1961>Be<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5712>company<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and <S%H1992>they,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> tomorrow: <S%H4279><s%>

And <S%H3947>take<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> them, and <S%H7126>bring<s%> ye <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H4289>censers;<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> also, and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of you his <S%H4289>censer.<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> them, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H413>thereon,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

And <S%H7141>Korah<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Separate <S%H914>yourselves<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them in a <S%H7281>moment.<s%>

And they <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H410>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> shall <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and wilt thou be <S%H7107>wroth<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation?<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Get you <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4480>about<s%> <S%H5439><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram;<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5493>Depart,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H408>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of theirs, <S%H6435>lest<s%> ye be <S%H5595>consumed<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

So they got <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> on every <S%H4480>side:<s%> <S%H5439><s%> and <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%> came <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives,<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and their little <S%H2945>children.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>Hereby<s%> ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4639>works;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> done them of mine own <S%H4480>mind.<s%> <S%H3820><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> men <S%H4191>die<s%> the common <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men,<s%> or if they be <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H6486>visitation<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men;<s%> then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me.

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1254>make<s%> a new <S%H1278>thing,<s%> and the <S%H127>earth<s%> <S%H6475>open<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and swallow them <S%H1104>up,<s%> <S%H853><s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> appertain unto them, and they go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2416>quick<s%> into the <S%H7585>pit;<s%> then ye shall <S%H3045>understand<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> have <S%H5006>provoked<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> that the <S%H127>ground<s%> cleaved <S%H1234>asunder<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H8478>under<s%> them:

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and swallowed them <S%H1104>up,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and their <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> appertained unto <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7399>goods.<s%>

They, <S%H1992><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> appertained to them, went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> into the <S%H7585>pit,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3680>closed<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them: and they <S%H6>perished<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were round <S%H5439>about<s%> them <S%H5127>fled<s%> at the <S%H6963>cry<s%> of them: <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> swallow us <S%H1104>up<s%> also.

And there came <S%H3318>out<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H853>the<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H7004>incense.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that he take <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4289>censers<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H996><s%> the <S%H8316>burning,<s%> and <S%H2219>scatter<s%> thou the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1973>yonder;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they are <S%H6942>hallowed.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> The <S%H4289>censers<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> against their own <S%H5315>souls,<s%> let them <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> them <S%H7555>broad<s%> <S%H6341>plates<s%> for a <S%H6826>covering<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H7126>offered<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> therefore they are <S%H6942>hallowed:<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4289>censers,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> they that were <S%H8313>burnt<s%> had <S%H7126>offered;<s%> and they were made <S%H7554>broad<s%> plates for a <S%H6826>covering<s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

To be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>stranger,<s%> <S%H2114><s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> of the <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> come <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H6999>offer<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> that he <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> as <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and as his <S%H5712>company:<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to him by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

But on the <S%H4480>morrow<s%> <S%H4283><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H859>Ye<s%> have <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> was <S%H6950>gathered<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> that they <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>
